Title: Relates to prohibitions on fur products
Summary: Relates to prohibitions on fur products; prohibits the manufacture, sale, display for sale, trade, giving, donating, or otherwise distributing of a fur product by any means in the state beginning twenty-four months after this act becomes a law.
LawCode: Add ยง399-bbbb, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the prohibition on fur products
